name: Scroll bar - custom thickness and colors
description: Customize the scroll bar's colors and thickness (useful for touch screens)

user.name: Sam Nordberg
user.about: Just upping some styles that I personally made for my convenience. They're not perfect, but I think satisfactory.

additional_info:
Use this style to modify Chrome's scroll bar. Especially useful on touch screen laptops, where the scrollbar is too small/thin to scroll easily. But useful for anybody.

Defaults to a scrollbar 30px thick and a dark color theme. But you can customize it with your own desired width and color scheme.

style_settings.label: How thick (in pixels, just a plain number, 30 is default)
